Class DataSourceLibro

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.univr.db.AbstractDataSource
      • it.univr.db.DataSourceLibro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DataSourceLibro
extends AbstractDataSource
    DataSource che gestisce le query dei Libri.
    Author:
    Matteo Olivato, Federico Bianchi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
